articles.image_title: ISTANBUL, TURKEY - AUGUST 7: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan delivers a speech during ‚ÄúDemocracy and Martyrs' Rally‚Äù, held to protest against the July 15 failed coup by the Fetullah Terrorist Organization (FETO), at Yenikapi in Istanbul, Turkey on August 7, 2016. Turkish officials accuse U.S.-based Turkish citizen Fetullah Gulen plotting to overthrow the government of President Erdogan as the culmination of a long running campaign to infiltrate Turkish institutions including the military, the police and the judiciary.
